results.content:
I thought this course will go deeper with ELM however it is two courses in one (ELM and gameMaker). My interest was solely in ELM. 
The ELM instructor was however good.
results.content_html:
I thought this course will go deeper with ELM however it is two courses in one (ELM and gameMaker). My interest was solely in ELM.
The ELM instructor was however good.

results.content:
Get 2 courses for the price of  1

A great way to get started with Elm and GameMaker studio 1.4

Elm is presented in a such a  way that you can continue using Elm
in your own projects. Elm is lighting fast and Error Proof for the Web.

the huge amount of  GameMaker tutorials will have you thinking in a game mindset, while developing a comfort level with gamemaker.
results.content_html:

the huge amount of GameMaker tutorials will have you thinking in a game mindset, while developing a comfort level with gamemaker.

results.content: Knowledgeable instructor. Pace is not too slow. Sections can easily be skipped if you are familiar with some aspects of elm.
results.content_html: Knowledgeable instructor. Pace is not too slow. Sections can easily be skipped if you are familiar with some aspects of elm.

results.content: The instructor explains the concepts well and provides enough examples for me to grasp the ideas.
results.content_html: The instructor explains the concepts well and provides enough examples for me to grasp the ideas.

results.content: Openings and endings on each video are quite annoying. But rest of that I already seen is awesome!

response.content: Hi Piotr, thank you for letting us know, and we'll be improving so that this isn't the case. Please feel free to ask questions in the Q&A.

results.content: Please i just bought the course and its totally useless, update videos during Elm versionsor say about changes. whats the point selling this?

results.content:
So far I had one big issue that took me a half-hour to figure out with pipe. I kept thinking that I had to make a new line everytime I'd pipe something, but I figured out about a half hour later that I didn't have to make a new line to do that. I'm sorry if you said this in the video already and I missed it.

I also noticed there wasn't any responses to any questions asked in a long time, so I am a bit discouraged by that. Nonetheless, I'm interested in studying functional programming, so I'll continue the course.
results.content_html:

results.content: Very engaging content and delivery. excited to build apps with Elm
results.content_html: Very engaging content and delivery. excited to build apps with Elm

results.content: Don't like ad-hoc examples the instructor used to demonstrate features of Elm. But the biggest disappointment is that I was wrong thinking that I would be taught how to build games in Elm. In reality, we are just shown how to use Gamemaker.
results.content_html: Don't like ad-hoc examples the instructor used to demonstrate features of Elm. But the biggest disappointment is that I was wrong thinking that I would be taught how to build games in Elm. In reality, we are just shown how to use Gamemaker.

results.content: Just started this course, the examples and the instructions are easy to understand and follow. I am excited about the  journey that awaits me.
